get.description: Retrieve project-wide annotations for large-scale dataset building and AI agent evaluation workflows.
Retrieve all annotations for a trace to support systematic debugging and evaluation workflows in agent testing.

post.description: Create annotations for traces to support domain labeling, evaluation scoring, and agent testing workflows.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the trace to annotate

get.description: Retrieve single annotations to inspect evaluation inputs, domain labels, and agent testing context.

delete.description: Delete annotations as part of maintaining clean evaluation datasets and agent testing pipelines.

patch.description: Patch annotations programmatically to refine trace labeling and support structured AI agent evaluation workflows.

post.description: Search traces with filters, text query, and date range. Returns AI-readable trace digests by default, or raw JSON data. Supports pagination via scrollId.

query.description: Text search query to match against trace content

scrollId.description: Pagination token from a previous search response to fetch the next page

format.description: Output format: 'digest' returns AI-readable formatted traces with span hierarchy, 'json' returns full raw trace data

items.description: When format=digest: includes trace_id, formatted_trace, input, output, timestamps, metadata, error. When format=json: full raw trace object.

formatted_trace.description: AI-readable hierarchical span digest (only present when format=digest)

scrollId.description: Pass this value as scrollId in the next request to fetch the next page

get.description: Get full details of a single trace by ID. Returns AI-readable trace digest by default with span hierarchy, evaluations, and metadata. Use format=json for full raw data including all spans.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Output format: 'digest' (default, AI-readable) or 'json' (full raw data)

schema.description: When format=digest: includes trace_id, formatted_trace, timestamps, metadata, evaluations. When format=json: includes spans array, evaluations, ascii_tree, metadata.

formatted_trace.description: AI-readable hierarchical span digest (only present when format=digest)

spans.description: Full span data (only present when format=json)

ascii_tree.description: ASCII tree representation (only present when format=json)

post.description: Generate public trace paths using LangWatch to share insights, evaluations, and agent testing results securely.

get.description: Retrieve prompts via the API to support versioning, evaluation workflows, and agent testing pipelines.

put.description: Update prompts to refine versions, run new evaluations, and test agent performance under changing configurations.

delete.description: Delete prompts programmatically using LangWatch to manage versioning and maintain clean evaluation pipelines.

get.description: Retrieve prompt versions for structured version control, evaluations, and automated AI agent testing workflows.

post.description: Sync/upsert a prompt with local content
Add dataset entries programmatically using the LangWatch API to build evaluation sets for LLM testing and agent validation.

get.description: Get a dataset by its slug or id.
Retrieve all prompts for a project to manage prompt versioning, run comparisons, and support agent testing pipelines.

post.description: Create new prompts with LangWatchâ€™s API to manage versions, run evaluations, and support automated agent testing pipelines.
Create new scenario events for simulation-based agent testing using LangWatchâ€™s API.

isThumbsUp.description: The thumbs up status of the annotation

createdAt.description: The created at of the annotation

updatedAt.description: The updated at of the annotation
